short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 🚀 Summarize Any Webpage, Any Language, One Click! 🌐

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨ tldrx.me: Your go-to extension to 🕒 SAVE TIME by summarizing any webpage with just a single click! This powerful tool supports more than 50 languages.

👨‍💻 How to Use:
1. 🌐 Surf your favorite websites as usual.
2. 📑 Encounter a lengthy page? Just click the tldrx.me extension button for a concise summary!

📝  Limitation:
- 📊 Capable of summarizing up to 3,000 words of content.
- 📄 Only supports article-type web pages.
- 🔒 Only supports public web pages

🌍 Language Support: 
Including but not limited to
- English 🇬🇧/🇺🇸
- Mandarin Chinese 🇨🇳
- Hindi 🇮🇳
- Spanish 🇪🇸
- French 🇫🇷
- Arabic 🇸🇦
- Bengali 🇧🇩
- Russian 🇷🇺
- Portuguese 🇵🇹/🇧🇷
- Urdu 🇵🇰/🇮🇳
- Indonesian 🇮🇩
- German 🇩🇪
- Japanese 🇯🇵
- Punjabi 🇮🇳/🇵🇰
- Telugu 🇮🇳
- Marathi 🇮🇳
- Turkish 🇹🇷
- Vietnamese 🇻🇳
- Tamil 🇮🇳/🇱🇰
- Korean 🇰🇷
and many more...
